original_text: “If he were not a criminal,” they replied, “we would not have handed him over to you.”
korean_text: 대답하여 이르되 이 사람이 행악자가 아니었더라면 우리가 당신에게 넘기지 아니하였겠나이다

sentences.original_text: If he were not a criminal,
we would not have handed him over to you.
sentences.korean_translation: 우리는 그를 당신에게 넘기지 않았을 것입니다.
